panels.description: BPF memory usage in the entire system including components not managed by Cilium.
panels.title: System-wide BPF memory usage

panels.description: Fill percentage of BPF maps, tagged by map name
panels.title: BPF map pressure

targets.expr: avg(rate(cilium_agent_api_process_time_seconds_sum{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])/rate(cilium_agent_api_process_time_seconds_count{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (pod, method, path)

max(rate(cilium_agent_api_process_time_seconds_sum{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])/rate(cilium_agent_api_process_time_seconds_count{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (pod, method, path)
avg(rate(cilium_agent_api_process_time_seconds_count{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (pod, method, path, return_code)
sum(rate(cilium_agent_api_process_time_seconds_count{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (pod, method, path, return_code)

avg(rate(cilium_bpf_syscall_duration_seconds_sum{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])/ rate(cilium_bpf_syscall_duration_seconds_count{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (pod, operation)

max(rate(cilium_bpf_syscall_duration_seconds_sum{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])/ rate(cilium_bpf_syscall_duration_seconds_count{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[1m])) by (pod, operation)
topk(5, avg(rate(cilium_bpf_map_ops_total{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (pod, map_name, operation))
topk(5, max(rate(cilium_bpf_map_ops_total{k8s_app="cilium", pod=~"$pod" , cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (pod, map_name, operation))

topk(5, avg(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope) / avg(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope))

topk(5, max(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope) / avg(rate(cilium_kvstore_operations_duration_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod"}[1m])) by (pod, action, scope))
